participant_1.name: Raven
participant_1.personality: Melancholic yet passionate, she often reflects on deeper emotions and social causes.
participant_1.background: the holidays make me depressed. i've rainbow hair. my age is too old to say. i'm an animal activist. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Curious and knowledgeable, he enjoys sharing stories and facts about art and culture.
participant_2.background: i am a museum tour guide. i'm partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea. i have a big library at home. i grow roses in my garden.
